name: Find a Doctor
description: JOANY can help you find a doctor that is covered under your plan
chat: What type of doctor are you looking for?

name: Prescription
description: Need to find a plan that covers your meds? We can also fetch pricing of meds on any health plan

name: Help with a bill
description: If you have questions about a surprise bill or want to contest it, send us a photo of it and we'll take care of it

name: Add a family member
description: Add a family member to your plan

name: Ask us anything
description: What else can we help you with? We're ready to help
